verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and has <S%H5394>cast<s%> out <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H7227>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than you;

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> you; you shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> them, and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them; you shall <S%H3772>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> show <S%H2603>mercy<s%> to them:

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you make <S%H2859>marriages<s%> with them; your <S%H1323>daughter<s%> you shall not <S%H5414>give<s%> to his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> to your <S%H1121>son.<s%>

For they will <S%H5493>turn<s%> away your <S%H1121>son<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> me, that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods:<s%> so will the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you <S%H4118>suddenly.<s%>

But <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall you <S%H6213>deal<s%> with them; you shall <S%H5422>destroy<s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H7665>break<s%> down their <S%H4676>images,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> down their <S%H842>groves,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H6456>graven<s%> images with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

For you are an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> you to be a <S%H5459>special<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to himself, above <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> that are on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did not set his <S%H2836>love<s%> on you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> you, because you were <S%H7230>more<s%> in number than <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> for you were the <S%H4592>fewest<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%>

But <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H160>loved<s%> you, and because he would <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> you out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> he is <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H2617>mercy<s%> with them that <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%>

And <S%H7999>repays<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him to their <S%H6440>face,<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> them: he will not be <S%H309>slack<s%> to him that <S%H8130>hates<s%> him, he will <S%H7999>repay<s%> him to his <S%H6440>face.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

Why it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H6118>if<s%> you <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> to you the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and the <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers:<s%>

And he will <S%H157>love<s%> you, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you: he will also <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H990>womb,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H127>land,<s%> your <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and your <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and your <S%H3323>oil,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>cows,<s%> and the <S%H6251>flocks<s%> of your <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you.
You shall be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> above <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> there shall not be male or female <S%H6135>barren<s%> among you, or among your <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5493>take<s%> away from you <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> and will <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4064>diseases<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3045>know,<s%> on you; but will <S%H5414>lay<s%> them on <S%H3605>all<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you.

And you shall <S%H398>consume<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> you; your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> on them: <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods;<s%> for that will be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to you.

<S%H3588>If<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H7227>more<s%> than I; <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> I <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them?

You shall not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them: but shall well <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and the <S%H226>signs,<s%> and the <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and the <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and the <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H2220>arm,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out: <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you are <S%H3373>afraid.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> among them, <S%H5704>until<s%> they that are <S%H7604>left,<s%> and <S%H5641>hide<s%> themselves from you, be <S%H6>destroyed.<s%>

You shall not be <S%H6206>affrighted<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> them: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5394>put<s%> out <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by <S%H4592>little<s%> and <S%H4592>little:<s%> you <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H3615>consume<s%> them <S%H4118>at<s%> <S%H4118>once,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7235>increase<s%> on you.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them to you, and shall <S%H2000>destroy<s%> them with a <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H4103>destruction,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5414>deliver<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H375>man<s%> be <S%H3320>able<s%> to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them.

The <S%H6456>graven<s%> images of their <S%H430>gods<s%> shall you <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> you shall not <S%H2530>desire<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> them, nor <S%H3947>take<s%> it to you, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you be <S%H3369>snared<s%> therein: for it is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall you <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> your <S%H1004>house,<s%> lest you be a <S%H2764>cursed<s%> thing <S%H3644>like<s%> it: but you shall utterly <S%H8262>detest<s%> it, and you shall utterly <S%H8581>abhor<s%> it; for it is a <S%H2764>cursed<s%> thing.
